--- title: Update Gene Symbols keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Update gene symbols to official HGNC gene symbols." description: "Update gene symbols to official HGNC gene symbols." nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install update_gs_hgnc

How to use

Use this package to get the official gene symbol as follows:

{% raw %} 
from update_gs_hgnc import core as update_gs

off_gs = update_gs.get_official_gene_symbol('VARS')
off_gs

'VARS1'
{% endraw %}
